item.biomech.power_leggings.tooltip: Crouch to store kinetic power. After a half-second, you gain increased jump height. Afterwards, each half-second crouched increases jump height even further.
item.biomech.hovertech_leggings.tooltip: Causes the user to hover above the ground, rendering ground effects harmless and increasing jump height by 1 block.  Also grants the wearer slowfall during falls.  Crouch to temporarily disable the hover technology.
item.biomech.lavastride_leggings.tooltip: Allows the user to walk on the surface of lava.
